TK_Linear_Pattern Class Reference

#include <BOpcodeHandler.h>

Inheritance diagram for TK_Linear_Pattern:

Collaboration diagram for TK_Linear_Pattern:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

TK_Linear_Pattern provided support for writing/reading the TKE_Line_Pattern and TKE_Edge_Pattern opcode objects, which represent a composite of the dashing pattern, cap style, and join style. This has been superceded by TK_Named.

Definition at line 4654 of file BOpcodeHandler.h.

TK_Status TK_Linear_Pattern::Read (  BStreamFileToolkit &  tk  )  [virtual]
 

Reads data from the toolkit buffer, decodes/decompresses it, and maps it to the opcode handlers data members. User-defined classes which need to write out custom data should utilize one of the available GetData() methods.

Parameters:
tk A reference to the BStreamFileToolkit object.
Returns:
The result of the function call.

Implements BBaseOpcodeHandler.

Definition at line 4652 of file BOpcodeHandler.h.

TK_Status TK_Linear_Pattern::Write (  BStreamFileToolkit &  tk  )  [virtual]
 

Encodes/compresses data and writes data to the toolkit buffer. User-defined classes which need to write out custom data should utilize one of the available PutData() methods, and first write out the opcode associated with the group of binary data followed by the data itself.

Parameters:
tk A reference to the BStreamFileToolkit object.
Returns:
The result of the function call.

Implements BBaseOpcodeHandler.
